name: OPMStatus
0:
”Alexa, ask o. p. m. status is the government open today”
”Alexa, ask o. p. m. status was the government open on March 03, 2017”
”Alexa, ask o. p. m. status do I have to go to work today”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: o. p. m. status
des: The purpose of this skill is to allow the user to query the OPM API to determine if the federal government is open for the current day or to ask if the government was open on a particular day in the past.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
